short_summary: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the purchase of category 3 furniture under Furniture Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/PQ including delivery and installation located in Longueuil, QuÃ¨bec, Canada.
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 20, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.',\
